**Government Tender Announcement**
# Helicopter Mooring Straps for Canadian Coast Guard

**Reference Number:** WS4112320231-Doc4113013506
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Publication Date:** July 31, 2023

## Introduction
This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services on behalf of Transport Canada for the development of para-aramid straps for helicopter mooring on Canadian Coast Guard ships.

## Proposal Details
The successful bidder will be responsible for designing, testing, and delivering para-aramid straps that meet the specified requirements. The proposed system should provide a safe and reliable means of securing helicopters on Coast Guard vessels.

## Evaluation Criteria
Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price, with the following factors considered:

* Technical capabilities
* Pricing and cost structure
* Warranty and maintenance requirements
* Timely delivery and project completion

## Conditions of Tender
Please note that all required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by September 9, 2023 at 14:00 HNE. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

## Contract Details
The successful bidder will be awarded a contract for a period of [insert period] with an expected start date of August 28, 2023. The contracting authority is the Department of Public Works and Government Services, with the end-user being Transport Canada.

## Contact Information
For further information, please contact:

* Ahmed El-Halawany
* ahmed.el-halawany@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Please note that contact information for phone and fax numbers is not available at this time.
